key.name: excluded-output-names
key.description: Display names of audio outputs that should be hidden from the Gnome's Quick Settings output audio devices panel. It's persistent across reloads of the extensions

key.name: available-output-names
key.description: Display names of all output devices that would normally be displayed in Gnome's Quick Settings output audio devices panel. It's refreshed every time extension is enabled.

key.name: excluded-input-names
key.description: Display names of audio inputs that should be hidden from the Gnome's Quick Settings input audio devices panel. It's persistent across reloads of the extensions

key.name: available-input-names
key.description: Display names of all input devices that would normally be displayed in Gnome's Quick Settings input audio devices panel. It's refreshed every time extension is enabled.
